title: CLASSICAL - The Complete Songs of Gabriel Faure [4CD]

This first disc takes its title, Au bord de l?eau, from the famous song which became FaurÃƒÂ©?s calling-card, and presents a generous programme of mÃƒÂ©lodies of an aquatic nature.
